name: Eagle Island Twist
descr: 关于此游戏The award-winningEagle Islandis a roguelite action-platformer that offers a unique blend of falconry-inspired combat mechanics, procedurally generated levels, and challenging boss fights. Players can choose between the narrative-driven story or speed-runner-like rogue mode, mixing and matching 85 abilities to diversify their gameplay.OVER 85 ABILITIES & PROCEDURALLY-GENERATED LEVELS IN CLASSIC MODE"Throw" your owl companion into battle imbued with special abilities! Explore procedurally-generated worlds, set to a beautifully modernized pixel art aesthetic. Levels are also packed with secrets and areas to explore.EXPLORE MORE IN HANDCRAFTED TWIST MODEIn Eagle Island TWIST, you'll experience 45 carefully crafted, retro-themed stages that can be traversed on a 16-bit era world map. TWIST offers even more content to an already well-rounded game, providing a range of mini-games to supplement Classic Mode's roguelite feel.LOADED WITH ACCESSIBILITY FEATURESThere are over 18 accessibility settings that can be easily enabled--Such as: remappable controls, difficulty options, text visibility, high contrast, and toggles for flashing and screen shaking.
